synopsis.text:
Kazuki, Hiro, and Koji, former members of Over The Rainbow, break away from Edel Rose to form their own agency, marking the beginning of a new chapter. Meanwhile, Ichijo Shin, after representing Edel Rose in the Prism King Cup and catching a glimpse of his potential future as a Prism Star, takes his first steps into Kakyoin Academy as a first-year high school student.

Amidst these changes, Norizuki Jin, the leader of Schwarz Rose, finds himself stripped of his Prism King title by Hiro. In response, Jin proposes PRISM.1, a competition to crown a new king, independent of the previous title. The stage is set for a fierce battle between Schwarz Rose and Edel Rose.

As preparations for PRISM.1 reach their peak, Yukinojo finds himself caught in a personal dilemma. Torn between his commitment to kabuki and his passion for the Prism Show, he grapples with feelings of inadequacy and uncertainty about his future. His father, witnessing his struggle, suggests he abandon the world of Prism Shows.

This is a tale of aspiring Prism Stars, their trials, and the conflicts they face. As they navigate their personal and professional challenges, they pour their hearts into stunning Prism Shows, promising a visual spectacle that will captivate your heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
